item.title: Trump Issues ‘Last Warning’ to Hamas to Release Israeli Hostages
item.description: In a blistering social media post, the president told Hamas that if it continued to hold hostages, “you are DEAD!”

item.title: Europe Races to Craft a Trump-Era Plan for Ukraine and Defense
item.description: European leaders are gathering in Brussels to discuss how to support Ukraine and fend more for themselves on defense.

item.title: Where the Gaza Cease-Fire Deal Goes Now Is Uncertain. Here’s What to Know.
item.description: As negotiators are holding discussions on multiple tracks, Palestinians and Israelis are in limbo.
